name: hextorio
title: Hextorio - Build in hexagons
author: sOvr9000
description: As they've always said since 325 B.C., hexagons are the bestagons! You start inside a hexagon with water and limited resources. The goal is to reach the solar system edge, like normal. During your journey, you'll discover many ways to simplify your methods and revolutionize your factory! And most importantly... get rich! Level up, explore, and discover a version of Factorio you wish you had all along.
